abstract: Lucas Bongane Thwala (born 19 October 1981 in Nelspruit, Mpumalanga) is a South African soccer defender who currently plays for SuperSport United in the Premier Soccer League.
comment: Lucas Bongane Thwala (born 19 October 1981 in Nelspruit, Mpumalanga) is a South African soccer defender who currently plays for SuperSport United in the Premier Soccer League.
